      • getAngleBetweenPoints

        public static float getAngleBetweenPoints(com.jme3.math.Vector3f pointA,
                                          com.jme3.math.Vector3f pointB,
                                          com.jme3.math.Vector3f pointC,
                                          boolean is2DSpace)
        Computes the angle between three given points A, B, and C at point B.
        Parameters:
        pointA - 3-dimensional point A
        pointB - 3-dimensional point B where angle is measured
        pointC - 3-dimensional point C
        is2DSpace - Compute angle in 2D-space (y=0 in points A, B, C)
        Returns:
        Angle between vector BA and vector BC
